definition: a United States liquid unit equal to 16 fluid ounces
details:
noun
- a United States liquid unit equal to 16 fluid ounces
= example: a United States liquid unit equal to 16 fluid ounces
- a United States dry unit equal to 0.5 quart or 33.6 cubic inches
= synonyms: dry pint
- a British imperial capacity measure (liquid or dry) equal to 4 gills or 568.26 cubic centimeters
- informally, a beer
= example: informally, a beer
